thread.title: "I've never been so happy" - Nobel winner Malala in Pakistan

title: "I've never been so happy" - Nobel winner Malala in Pakistan
text:
"I've never been so happy" - Nobel winner Malala in Pakistan   01:30 
On a return visit to Pakistan, Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai addressd her critics who accuse her of promoting an ideology at odds with the country's Islamic values. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
